<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition>new x_463716_rp_draft.RPDraftUtills().checkRITMEnrollment(current.getValue('sys_id'))</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Remove Draft After Submission</name><order>100</order><priority>500</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var utils = new x_463716_rp_draft.RPDraftUtills();
	utils.wait(11000);
	utils.deleteDraft(current.getValue('cat_item'), gs.getUserID(), undefined, current.getValue('order_guide'));

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zdravko.verguilov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-27 14:16:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4b26454407c59110d44bf16c7c1ed009</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Remove Draft After Submission</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="RP Draft" source="x_463716_rp_draft">221bdf0b07e01110d44bf16c7c1ed067</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="RP Draft">221bdf0b07e01110d44bf16c7c1ed067</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4b26454407c59110d44bf16c7c1ed009</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zdravko.verguilov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-24 10:57:48</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4b26454407c59110d44bf16c7c1ed009"/></record_update>
